io.codepace

Class SimpleHttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.codepace.SimpleHttpRequest

  • public class SimpleHttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for simple http requests. The default request type is HttpTypes.GET

      • SimpleHttpRequest

        public SimpleHttpRequest(java.lang.String hostname,
                         java.lang.String putFilePath)

        USE THIS ONLY FOR PUT REQUESTS!!!!

        Loads up a PUT request to . The data that will be "put" on the server will be data read in from

        Parameters:
        hostname - The host to request
        putFilePath - The data to put

      • SimpleHttpRequest

        public SimpleHttpRequest(java.lang.String hostname,
                         javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>[] postParams)

        USE THIS ONLY FOR POST REQUESTS WITH PARAMETERS!!!!

        Loads up a post request with the given parameters.

        Parameters:
        hostname - The host to request
        postParams - The url parameters (var=val associates to key=value (in Java)
